description:
Hakaze is the princess of the sorcerer family, Kusaribe, and the most powerful sorceress in history. She was caught in a trap by http://anidb.net/ch48178 [Samon], a member of her family who opposed her ideas, stuffed in a barrel, and banished to an uninhabited island where she couldn`t use magic.
Source: ANN
name: Kusaribe Hakaze
